dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A resident of Astana just got three and a half years in prison for selling fake airline tickets to Vietnam.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A resident of Astana just got three and a half years in prison for selling fake airline tickets to Vietnam.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A resident of Astana has been sentenced to prison after scamming 70 Kazakhstanis by selling them fake airline tickets to Vietnam, citing the Prosecutor General's Office. The court sentenced the woman to three years and six months in prison and ordered her to compensate the victims for their financial losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, I read about this. She uh, scammed like 70 people, right? Offered tickets way below market price.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, I read about this. She uh, scammed like seventy people, right? Offered tickets way below market price.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A resident of Astana has been sentenced to prison after scamming 70 Kazakhstanis by selling them fake airline tickets to Vietnam, citing the Prosecutor General's Office. The woman offered flight tickets at prices below market rates, claiming she had access to special booking channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And she told them she had these special booking channels, which of course, turned out to be completely fake.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And she told them she had these special booking channels, which of course, turned out to be completely fake.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The woman offered flight tickets at prices below market rates, claiming she had access to special booking channels.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So she gave them forged itineraries instead of actual tickets. Can you imagine showing up at the airport excited for your trip and finding out it was all a lie?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So she gave them forged itineraries instead of actual tickets. Can you imagine showing up at the airport excited for your trip and finding out it was all a lie?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, instead of real tickets, she provided forged itineraries. Victims only discovered the scam at the airport when they attempted to check in for their flights.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's awful. And the total damage was over 17 million tenge. That's a huge amount of money lost.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's awful. And the total damage was over seventeen million tenge. That's a huge amount of money lost.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The total financial damage exceeded 17 million tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it wasn't just adults—kids were affected too. They missed their vacations, plus all the other bookings they'd made, like hotels and tours, were just gone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it wasn't just adults-kids were affected too. They missed their vacations, plus all the other bookings they'd made, like hotels and tours, were just gone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Among the victims were both adults and children. People not only lost money but also missed long-awaited vacations " hotel bookings, tours, and other prepaid services were also non-refundable," the agency's press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, none of that was refundable either. People lost so much more than just the ticket cost.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, none of that was refundable either. People lost so much more than just the ticket cost.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: People not only lost money but also missed long-awaited vacations " hotel bookings, tours, and other prepaid services were also non-refundable," the agency's press service said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, it's such a cruel scam because you're preying on people's excitement and trust.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, it's such a cruel scam because you're preying on people's excitement and trust.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: At least the court ordered her to compensate the victims, though I wonder how much they'll actually get back.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least the court ordered her to compensate the victims, though I wonder how much they'll actually get back.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The court sentenced the woman to three years and six months in prison and ordered her to compensate the victims for their financial losses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: True. And apparently, this isn't even the first time something like this has happened in Astana—there was a previous case about counterfeit documents for illegal migration, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. And apparently, this isn't even the first time something like this has happened in Astana-there was a previous case about counterfeit documents for illegal migration, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Previously, Astana residents were convicted of organizing illegal migration through the use of counterfeit documents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it seems like there's a pattern of document fraud in the area. Makes you double-check everything you book online now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it seems like there's a pattern of document fraud in the area. Makes you double-check everything you book online now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Always book through official sites, no matter how good a deal seems.
